last_episode_to_air.name: A Return to Evil
last_episode_to_air.overview: A string of baffling murders leads the team to suspect a serial killer. But evidence left by a victim points them toward a familiar face.

name: Pacific Heat
overview: They're absent-minded, mildly corrupt and barely competent. Somehow, they're Australia's most elite detective unit.

episodes.name: A Dangerous Game
episodes.overview: When the team goes undercover at a strip club to blow up a crystal meth ring, Maddie and VJ gain the trust of a stripper who knows key info.

episodes.name: Countdown to Death
episodes.overview: A shipment of uranium goes missing from a nuclear lab and the team must work out who has it, before anyone gets the chance to build a dirty bomb.

episodes.name: A Family Affair
episodes.overview: When a team member's father is kidnapped by a radical organization, Pacific Heat heads to the Southeast Asian jungle to rescue him.

episodes.name: The Science of Death
episodes.overview: When German terrorists break into a laboratory and threaten to release anthrax, the team hatches a sketchy plan to storm the building.

episodes.name: The Face of Terror
episodes.overview: Todd and Zac go undercover as security guards in Yemen to hunt for a dangerous terrorist, but they'll need Maddie and VJ's help to get out alive.

episodes.name: Married to Murder
episodes.overview: A journalist tags along as the team attempts to track down ecoterrorists who kidnapped the wife of a mining magnate.

episodes.name: A Troublesome Guest
episodes.overview: Tasked with providing security for the visiting leader of a volatile country, the team fends off various threats against his life.

episodes.name: In the Wrong Hands
episodes.overview: The team scrambles to find an arms dealer suspected of stealing a nuclear warhead that was being stored in a civilian warehouse.

episodes.name: A Brush with Death
episodes.overview: The team is charged with safeguarding a Dutch masterpiece called "Nude with Nude" at an art show. But the painting disappears anyway.

episodes.name: A Deadly Deal
episodes.overview: When an illegal arms dealer acquires a shipment of surface-to-air missiles, the team heads to the Burmese jungle to stop them from being sold.

episodes.name: Extreme Turbulence
episodes.overview: The team faces a midair crisis while serving as security for a sultan who insists on flying coach.

episodes.name: A Deadly Grudge
episodes.overview: Shortly after suspending the Pacific Heat agents, the chief is kidnapped by a pair of brothers who have held a grudge against him for 36 years.

episodes.name: A Return to Evil
episodes.overview: A string of baffling murders leads the team to suspect a serial killer. But evidence left by a victim points them toward a familiar face.
